author: AB de Royse777
content: PGP fingerprint is available: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1159946.msg48876137#msg48876137Code:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA256Job: Website Re-Design and Logo Design ServiceClient: mixerdream https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3526117Designer/developer: TheLead123 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2473857Escrow address: bc1q8777upu9tsu80n2vccm90csuq4pwpa3a46qnwcnr0ja3r4ckfqwsch7203Btc price moves, so today the amount of btc for $650 is not going to the same when the funds will be released. If failed to deliver the job then btc will be refund to mixerdream address.Refund (mixerdream) address: 16gehpWQEJPF4NsmCRtPYZLqhXrLLV2PfuPayment (TheLead123) address: 1MBaJ4aKKBpkcRWju3nvhHy8uctRFREjgtFunds will be paid once mixerdream will confirm he/she is happy with the work.[quote author=TheLead123]The main features and price breakdown for the deal is asfollows:‚óè New homepage design with simple and elegant design.‚óè New Elegant Logo for the business.‚óè The content should be the same as is in the old website.‚óè FAQ and Contact pages are the additional pages which will be designed.‚óè The theme of the whole website will be dark‚óè Since the website is in both clearnet and onion network, the work isdoubled.‚óè The turnaround time will be anywhere between 10-14 business days.‚óè We will be providing the updates on each step on our telegram group.‚óè Here are the price breakdown for clear understanding‚óã $200 for Homepage design.‚óã $100 for FAQ and Contact us page.‚óã Since there are two networks, $300 + $300 = $600‚óã $50 for logo design.‚óè The final price for all the services will be $650[/quote]-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE----------END PGP SIGNATURE-----@TheLead123 and @mixerdream please quote and confirm.üì£This campaign is designed and managed by:
